name: MAGIC ITEM (8): GANESH (MODERN ART)
description:
I purchased this statue at a music festival in Kolkata in Dec of 2012. 

The recent death of Ravi Shankar was on everyone's minds and was lamented on Public Billboards in the city.

This statue is unusual because of it's complete lack of detail, yet it still evokes the persona, power and presence of Lord Ganesh at least to me, an American vistor.

I treasure this item and the memories of the music I heard during that time.

This digital "token" confers upon you
a portion of the aesthetic and para-natural
power of this radiant meta-object.

Think on the maker of this physical item
and send them your gratitude
through the centuries - for the
privilege of holding it's
meta-verse avatar.

I took this photo and was blessed
by this object and the sincere
expression of it's maker.

I truly hope my photo gives a portion
of that warmth and comfort to you.

HPL
